#Command Format:
#[Data Count]:[Flags,Command]:[Periph Device, Address]:[Data(ignored for reads)]

#Ping
00000000:00000000:12345678:FEDCBA98

#Disable the logic analyzer
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000001

#Setup the logic analyzer
00000006:00000001:01000002:00000100
00000100
00000004
00000000
00000000
00000000

#Sleep
00000100

#Enable the logic analyzer
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000004

#Sleep
00000100

#Read response
00000016:00000002:0100000A:00000000

#Sleep
00000100

#Disable the logic analyzer
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000000

#Sleep
00000100

#Setup the logic analyzer
00000006:00000001:01000002:00000100
00000100
00000004
00000000
00000000
00000000

#Sleep
00000100

#Enable the logic analyzer
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000004

#Sleep
00000100

#Read response
00000016:00000002:0100000A:00000000
